revised_title: Isotope Shifts in the Resonance Line of the Arc Spectrum of Barium
tldr: The authors measured isotope shifts in the resonance line of the arc spectrum of barium by comparing the wavelengths of lines emitted by enriched isotopes. They found that the shifts for certain isotopes were in agreement with previous findings, while others showed discrepancies that could be explained by insufficient blending of hyperfine structure components. The study provides a better understanding of the atomic structure and properties of barium isotopes.
